data.text: naxan findixi n xanuntenyi sɛnbɛma ra,
Alatala, munse na adama ra i to fa mɛɛnixi a ma?
Adamadi luxi nɛ alɔ ɲɛngi foye,
Alatala, i xa koore rabi i gorofe ra,
I xa seyamakɔnyi rabula yaxuie rayensenfe ra.
I xa i bɛlɛxɛ itala kelife koore ma,
N nakisi wule falɛe ma naxee wama n madaxufe.
Ala, n bɛɛti nɛɛnɛ bama nɛ i bɛ n ma kɔra luuti fu daaxi xui ra.
N i matɔxɔma nɛ, i tan naxan mangɛe xun nakelima,
N nakisi, n natanga n yaxuie ma,
Na tɛmui muxu xa di xɛmɛe fanma nɛ alɔ wuri bilie,
Muxu xa banxie rafema nɛ daxamui mɔɔli birin na,
Sɛɛwɛ na ɲama bɛ Ala fama yi fe mɔɔli rabade naxan na.
